001package imagingbook.lib.image.access;
002
003import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
004import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
005import imagingbook.lib.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
006
007/**
008 * Image accessor for scalar images with 8-bit (byte) values.
009 */
010public class ByteAccessor extends ScalarAccessor {
011        private final byte[] pixels;
012
013        /**
014         * Constructor. Creates a new image accessor of type {@link ByteAccessor}. See also the
015         * generic factory method
016         * {@link ScalarAccessor#create(ImageProcessor, OutOfBoundsStrategy, InterpolationMethod)}.
017         * 
018         * @param ip  an instance of {@link ByteProcessor}
019         * @param obs the out-of-bounds strategy to be used (use {@code null} for
020         *            default settings)
021         * @param ipm the interpolation method to be used (use {@code null} for default
022         *            settings)
023         */
024        public ByteAccessor(ByteProcessor ip, OutOfBoundsStrategy obs, InterpolationMethod ipm) {
025                super(ip, obs, ipm);
026                this.pixels = (byte[]) this.ip.getPixels();
027        }
028
029        @Override
030        public float getVal(int u, int v) {
031                final int i = indexer.getIndex(u, v);
032                if (i < 0)
033                        return this.defaultValue;
034                else {
035                        return (0xff & pixels[i]);
036                }
037        }
038
039        @Override
040        public void setVal(int u, int v, float val) {
041                int i = indexer.getIndex(u, v);
042                if (i >= 0) {
043                        int vali = Math.round(val);
044                        if (vali < 0) vali = 0;
045                        if (vali > 255) vali = 255;
046                        pixels[i] = (byte) (0xFF & vali);
047                }
048        }
049}
